name: Rocket Labs VR
summary: Rocket Labs VR offers an immersive experience where players manually assemble a rocket, learning its structure and components. The exploded view mode provides a detailed breakdown, enhancing understanding. Each part reveals in-depth information when picked up, explaining its function. To further educate players, informative video guides explore the science behind rocketry. Perfect for space enthusiasts, this game delivers a hands-on, educational journey into aerospace engineering.
